name: swetrix
description: Swetrix is a privacy-focused web analytics platform that can be self-hosted or used as SaaS. It tracks visits without cookies and displays insights in a clean dashboard.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Tracks website visitors without cookies or personal data

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: Displays live visitor data and page views as they happen

features.title: Event Tracking
features.description: Monitors custom events like button clicks and form submissions

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Measures page load times and Core Web Vitals

features.title: Traffic Sources
features.description: Identifies referrers, UTM campaigns, and traffic channels

features.title: Geographic Data
features.description: Shows visitor locations by country and region

features.title: Device Analytics
features.description: Breaks down traffic by device type, browser, and OS

features.title: Custom Properties
features.description: Tracks custom dimensions for advanced segmentation
